query.stmt: SELECT spd.name company,TO_CHAR(create_time,'YYYY-MM') month,COUNT(*) count FROM bi_manu bm left join sys_p_department spd on bm.dept_id=spd.id where 1=1 <#if dept_id??> and spd.id = [dept_id] </#if> <#if urgency??> and TO_CHAR(create_time,'YYYY') = [urgency] </#if> <#if month??> and TO_CHAR(create_time,'MM') = [month] </#if> group by spd.name, TO_CHAR(create_time,'YYYY-MM')
